list.abs: flagrant 非常的flagrante delicto 现行犯的flagrantly 千真万确地
[体育英语]NBA篮球英语词汇英汉对照 ... first half： 上半场 flagrant foul： 恶性犯规 foul： 犯规.
篮球术语_百度百科 ... charging foul （持球）撞人犯规 flagrant foul（故意犯规） 故意（恶意）犯规 technical foul 技术犯规.
《GMAT600分词汇》第五课 ... flagellate v.鞭打 flagrant a.罪恶昭彰的，公然的 flaunt v.挥动，夸耀.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I) -亿城英语 ... in fine feather 精神饱满 in flagrant delict 在作案时 in flesh 肥胖.

auth_sentence.content: Impossible to secure convictions against people unless caught in flagrante delicto.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Impossible to secure convictions against people unless caught in flagrante delicto.

auth_sentence.content: His cringing wife and the imaginary lover he had always sworn to catch in flagrante delicto.
auth_sentence.res_content: His cringing wife and the imaginary lover he had always sworn to catch in flagrante delicto.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His cringing wife and the imaginary lover he had always sworn to catch in flagrante delicto.

auth_sentence.content: This trail led to yet more pictures, taken not only in flagrante but also in the midst of her murder.
